author: ws
content:
Ship strike is an immediate cause of death,
Are there Any underlying causes leading to this immediate cause of death?

While little is known about any direct physiological effects of sonar waves on marine species, evidence shows that whales will swim hundreds of miles, rapidly change their depth (sometime leading to bleeding from the eyes and ears), and even beach themselves to get away from the
sounds of sonar.

https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/does-military-sonar-kill/
